org.sadun.util
Class TelnetNVTChannel

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          org.sadun.util.TelnetInputStream
              org.sadun.util.TelnetNVTChannel
public class TelnetNVTChannel
extends TelnetInputStream

A telnet input stream to implement a Telnet NVT (Network Virtual Terminal) communication over a couple of paired input and output streams.

The class simply registers a org.sadun.util.TelnetInputStream.BasicNVTListner into a TelnetInputStream to handle DO and WILL commands rejecting every option.

Further handling of specific Telnet commands can be added by registering additional telnet command listeners with registerCommandListener().

A TelnetNVTChannel can be wrapped into a TelnetInputStreamConsumer to add input-consumption functionality.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Cristiano Sadun
